body_html: It certainly should not take 20 hours to compile. From your top output, it doesn't seem like tis chugging on CPU either. What architecture are you running this on? Which version of gcc? If you cancel the build and retry, does it still get stuck?

body: It certainly should not take 20 hours to compile. From your `top` output, it doesn't seem like tis chugging on CPU either. What architecture are you running this on? Which version of gcc? If you cancel the build and retry, does it still get stuck?
